quotes: In 1978, I traveled across the Atlantic to undertake a PhD in Economics at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT)
In 1978, I traveled across the Atlantic to undertake a PhD in Economics at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), graduating in 1981.
MIT had a relatively low profile in the field of economics until the arrival of Paul Samuelson in 1940, but in the 1960s it became the best economics department in the world.
